title: Gold rewards questions
body: So I just got gold 5 and was super excited until I started reading the comments. So since i just got off my 14 day ban back on the 15th of this month (september) am I disqualified for all rewards? Like no loading screen barrier, no skin, no ward nothing?  It'll be the exact same as if I completed the season in bronze?

replies.body: The cutoff date to be [**eligible for ranked rewards**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068) is 8/22/2017. If you've had a punishment lasting 14 days anytime after that date you won't be eligible, so it doesn't look like this account will be.
